html:
A Versatile Basic

Levi’s ’94 Baggy Jeans

Meet your new favorite jeans. Levi’s ’94 Baggy style is ultra-versatile with its classic black wash and mid-rise, straight-leg fit.

An Overdue Tech Upgrade

Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)

Looking to finally make the jump to AirPods? The second-generation Pro model, offering crisp audio and active noise-cancellation technology, can currently be yours for a record-low $154.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Discounted Designer Handbag

Coach Polished Pebble Tabby Messenger 19

Amazon’s ever-expanding selection of designer fashion includes hundreds of impressive Black Friday discounts. Example A: This Coach crossbody worthy of a spot in any wardrobe.

Aesthetically-Pleasing Tech

Samsung The Frame Series Smart TV (55-Inch)

That fancy Frame TV you’ve been eyeing for ages? Amazing news: It’s majorly marked down to under $900 right now.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Holiday Baking Hero

KitchenAid Artisan Series Stand Mixer

Once you own a KitchenAid stand mixer, you’ll wonder how you ever hosted dinner parties without one. Snag this best-selling model ASAP so you can start prepping for holiday baking season.

A Cold-Weather Accessory

Madewell Alpaca-Blend Cuffed Beanie

Now’s the time to grab cold-weather accessories you’ll rely on all winter long. Knit with a warm alpaca blend, this cozy, icy blue-colored beanie will even make you excited for snowy days.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Swiftie-Approved Gift

Taylor Swift The Tortured Poets Department Vinyl

Amazon currently has markdowns on Taylor Swift vinyl records, including the pop star’s latest album, The Tortured Poets Department. It’ll make the perfect gift for any Swiftie on your list.

Stylish Travel Pants

Splendid Angie Denim Pant

These casual denim pants from Splendid are comfortable enough for plane rides yet can easily be dressed up for a holiday dinner, too.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

An Easy Fashion Gift

Ray-Ban RB2194 John Square Sunglasses

Given these sleek Ray-Bans are currently more than 30 percent off, it’s worth grabbing a pair to wear now and one to gift later.

A Winter Essential

Marmot Guides Down Jacket

Everyone needs a solid puffer jacket in their arsenal of winter coats. Filled primarily with recycled down, this timeless Marmot number will keep you nice and warm.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Fan-Favorite Stocking Stuffer

Barefoot Dreams CozyChic 3-Pair Sock Set

Barefoot Dreams’ buttery soft fabric is the stuff of legends, so there’s a strong chance your giftee will be ecstatic the instant they feel these socks at the bottom of the gift bag.

A Workout on the Go

Fit Simplify Resistance Exercise Bands (Set of 5)

Lightweight and easy to pack, these resistance bands can take your regular gym workouts to the next level or help you slip in a quick toning session right from your hotel room.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Chic Coffee Table Book

Valentino: Themes and Variations by Pamela Golbin

Before presenting his first collection for Valentino this fall, Alessandro Michele logged countless hours in the Italian fashion house’s archives. Now, you can do the same thing with this stunning coffee table book.

A Surefire Gift for Anyone

Tory Burch Perry Triple-Compartment Tote

You’d be hard-pressed to find someone on your list who wouldn’t like this versatile Tory Burch shoulder bag. From college students to picky mothers-in-law, this sleek, timeless style pleases all—including you, since it’s under $300.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Holiday Travel Essential

Samsonite Framelock Max Hardside Luggage

Now’s the time to revamp your luggage for holiday travels. This lightweight Samsonite hard-side suitcase is under $200, so you’ll have enough left in your budget to grab a discounted carry-on, too.

A Better Night’s Sleep

Nectar Medium Firm Gel Memory Foam Mattress (Queen)

Why spend one more restless night on your current mattress when you can already score this reviewer-loved Nectar mattress for a fraction of the cost?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Celeb-Approved Hair Tool

Wavytalk 5-in-1 Curling Wand Set

Sabrina Carpenter’s hairstylist used this versatile curling wand to create the pop star’s signature bouncy looks during her Short n’ Sweet Tour. And now, you can grab the device on sale for just over $40.

Dyson Dyson Special Edition Airwrap Multi-Styler

If you're after the original Rolls-Royce of hot hair tools, take note that Dyson's legendary Airwrap multi-styler is on a steep deal on Amazon as well.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Skincare Restock

Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask (16-Count)

Amazon’s Black Friday sale is a great opportunity to stock up on best-selling skincare products, like this viral hydrating sheet mask ELLE editors love.

Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle

Owala rarely goes on sale, so it comes as no surprise that their water bottles are in high demand going into Cyber Monday. We clocked this deal on their viral FreeSip water bottle that's still in stock for those who could use the reminder to stay hydrated.

Sarah Maberry is a fashion and luxury commerce editor at Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level, helping readers determine what's worth buying. When she’s not writing for ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Town & Country, Esquire, Cosmopolitan and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
